dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Across Kazakhstan, a day of stark weather contrasts on April 17th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Across Kazakhstan, a day of stark weather contrasts on April seventeenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The weather in Kazakhstan on April 17 will be varied: some regions will see rain and thunderstorms, while others will enjoy partly cloudy skies without precipitation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Astana's looking at a pretty rough morning, with rain and snow expected.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Astana's looking at a pretty rough morning, with rain and snow expected.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana " Partly cloudy, rain and snow expected in the morning and daytime.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, and those winds are no joke—gusting up to 24 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, and those winds are no joke-gusting up to twenty four meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wind southwest turning northwest at 9"14 m/s, gusting up to 24 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Almaty's getting off easy—partly cloudy and no precipitation at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Almaty's getting off easy-partly cloudy and no precipitation at all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they'll have much warmer daytime temps too, like up to 19 degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they'll have much warmer daytime temps too, like up to nineteen degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: +5¦+7ÂC at night, +17¦+19ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then you've got Shymkent dealing with thunderstorms in the evening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then you've got Shymkent dealing with thunderstorms in the evening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shymkent " Partly cloudy, rain and thunderstorms in the evening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: With gusts up to 20 m/s, that's gonna be messy for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With gusts up to twenty meters per second, that's gonna be messy for sure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Northeast wind at 8"13 m/s, gusts up to 20 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Aktobe's got it clear, but they're still seeing nighttime frost down to minus three.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Aktobe's got it clear, but they're still seeing nighttime frost down to minus three.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Aktobe " Mostly clear, no precipitation. Nighttime frost down to -3ÂC, daytime temperature +14¦+16ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge swing from some of the southern cities like Turkestan hitting 26 degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge swing from some of the southern cities like Turkestan hitting twenty six degrees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: +7¦+9ÂC at night, +24¦+26ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And speaking of wind, Kokshetau's facing some of the strongest—20 meters per second sustained.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And speaking of wind, Kokshetau's facing some of the strongestminus twenty meters per second sustained.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southwest wind turning northwest at 15"20 m/s, gusts up to 23 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yikes, and with possible snow? That sounds unpleasant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yikes, and with possible snow? That sounds unpleasant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kokshetau " Partly cloudy, occasional rain and snow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Petropavlovsk is even colder—only plus two to four during the day, with rain and snow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Petropavlovsk is even colder-only plus two to four during the day, with rain and snow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Petropavlovsk " Cloudy, rain and snow. Temperature: 0¦+2ÂC at night, +2¦+4ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So basically, if you're traveling across Kazakhstan tomorrow, pack for everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So basically, if you're traveling across Kazakhstan tomorrow, pack for everything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. From dust storms in Turkestan to near-freezing in the north, it's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. From dust storms in Turkestan to near-freezing in the north, it's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkestan " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. Occasional dust storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Kazhydromet wasn't kidding about unstable conditions this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazhydromet wasn't kidding about unstable conditions this week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Kazhydromet's forecast, temperature fluctuations will continue, and overall, the weather will remain unstable across the country.
